contest-event.event-date:
May 23, 1931 D Ystrad Mynach Contest
Ystrad Mynach Contest 0 Test Piece Contest East Glamorgan League ystrad-mynach-contest
The Golden Age
Ystrad Mynach, Caerphilly, Wales, UK Contest for Class C bands only, March contest 1st Nine Mile Point. Best cornet and euphonium - Oakdale. 8 bands competed. Promoted by Penallta Colliery Band.
Oct. 12, 2012, 3:16 p.m. Dec. 13, 2018, 12:05 p.m.
1 Oakdale Silver Band David Parr
2 Hirwaun Welfare Town D. J. Edwards
3 Treherbert & District Band E. Gough
